name: Haskell (via ghcup)
description: Installs Haskell. An advanced, purely functional programming language

ghcVersion.description: Select the GHC (Glasgow Haskell Compiler) version to install.

cabalVersion.description: Select the Cabal (a system for building and packaging Haskell libraries and programs) version to install.

globalPackages.description: Packages to install via `cabal install`, such as `hlint` for linting. Separate with spaces. This will add significant initial build time.

installHLS.description: Install HLS, the Haskell Language Server.

downgradeGhcToSupportHls.description: This will downgrade GHC to the closest version supported by HLS. There is often a gap between a GHC release and tooling support.

installStack.description: Install Stack, a build tool for Haskell.

installStackGHCupHook.description: Enabling this means that stack won't install its own GHC versions, but uses GHCup's

adjustBash.description: whether to adjust PATH in bashrc (prepend)
